name: Rajasthan with the Locals
description:
This tour package is prepared in a way, that you can explore the limitless beauty of cultural Rajasthan and the royal life in its deserts. It will also help you in rediscovering yourself among the colourful people of the desert.

Right from the pink city Jaipur, this tour will take you to other surrounding regions that are popular for their tranquil atmosphere, handcraft materials and much more. While the glorious forts and havelis will add more flavour to this trip, the charm of the local people and the captivating beauty of the various lakes and palaces will keep your minds immersed with admiration and will make your trip, one of its own kind.
